author: kfogel
msg: BlameCallback.cpp and BlameCallback.h.  This was part of r8652,
and is required to compile libsvnjavahl.so on Unix.
We were not able to test this, unfortunately, but the patch looks
correct -- it does nothing more than add these two filenames -- and we
think it less risky to ship with the change than without.
